basics.name: Unknown
basics.label: Freelance Production Manager - Men's & Women's Wovens/Knits
basics.summary: Creative Development and Production Manager with a strong background in Men's and Women's Wovens, Denim, Knits, and Graphics. Passion to expand upon current skill sets and areas of expertise. Sets and maintains high personal and professional standards. Creative strategic thinker; strong ability to quickly identify, analyze, and resolve challenges to achieve the most effective outcome.

work.name: Company Name
work.position: Freelance Production Manager - Men's & Women's Wovens/Knits
work.summary: Daily overseas communication with multiple factories regarding status of fit. Managed the costing and negotiation process for 50% of the total business with overseas vendors in Hong Kong, Vietnam, Cambodia, and India to ensure 80% target margin was achieved.

work.name: Company Name
work.position: Associate Pre-Production Manager - Men's and Women's Graphics
work.summary: Managed the design and development cycle for numerous styles and skus per season. Created reference library and standardized all graphic print techniques to ensure brand aesthetic was met across all vendors.

courses: Marketing, Public Relations, Advertising, International Business, Entrepreneurship, and Fashion Illustration
